storyInfo: Qiubai waits for an opportunity to enter Yumen from Lungmen while under the care of a benefactor. But as the days pass, she begins to realize that this shopkeep has a most extraordinary past.

attributes.content: I think the situation's pretty clear to me now.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Deui m jyu, Neuisi. We assumed you were carrying that sword for nefarious purposes, but it was all a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We understand you burst into a home while running for your life.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: As for the ones who attacked you, witnesses weren't able to give too many details, but the L.G.D. will investigate to the best of our ability.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: However, there is the matter of compensation for the glass you broke...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I can't pay.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Alright, no need to worry. I actually came to inform you that your relative explained the situation and paid what you owe, so you're free to go.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...My relative?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I know it's not the best feeling, relying on family for your first visit to Lungmen.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: But in these circumstances, better you ask her for help than end up with a criminal record.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You're quick with your sword, and you weren't the most forthcoming with an explanation. If you'd resisted arrest with that blade, it would've been a lot more trouble for all of us.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I'm glad you're keeping fit with kung fu, but do be more careful here in Lungmen.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Alright, Neuisi. We've returned your weapon, so hurry on back home.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: But I don't know...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Never mind. Doje.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, it's you, Loubaan.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Take this. It's an ointment for your wounds.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just a few scratches from the broken glass.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I appreciate you getting me out of jail. Doje.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You sure know how to give an old woman a scare.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Lucky for you I noticed when you didn't pass by for two days. I asked around the neighborhood only to learn that you had men trying to kill you, and that you'd escaped into one of those fancy uptown apartment blocks.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: People have been watching me so closely?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The waiter at the dai pai dong across the way. She loves to gossip.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Yes she does...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Did you hear anything from her?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Nothing really.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I heard this shop is haunted. Apparently, a lot of people died here, many years ago.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And I also heard that you make mysterious visits to the cemetery, tending to the grave of someone she doesn't know.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: *sigh* She's been reading those conspiracy magazines again. I'm afraid she'll lose her mind if she keeps at them.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: There is one thing she's right about, at least. You are rather strange, Loubaan.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I caused trouble, but you weren't afraid. You even came to my rescue.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Haha... I think you'll find that you're the strange one, Qiu.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: If I hadn't gone to the L.G.D. to explain things, would you really have just sat there without a word?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: People like me are not exactly trustworthy, and I didn't know who was chasing me. It would have been rather difficult to explain it all.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: A better move would have been to buy time and find an opportunity to escape.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You think you could have escaped?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Bandit strongholds, merchant escorts. I've escaped a few times in the past.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Those aren't really the same.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Besides, didn't you say you were going to Yumen to look for someone?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Lungmen's about to link up with Yumen. If you miss this opportunity, the two cities will separate and go far apart.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: A nomadic city can travel dozens of li in a day. If you journey on foot like before, you'd be walking for months.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Doesn't matter to me if it's months early or months late, I'm fine either way.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And anyway, Yumen is preparing for battle and not admitting travelers. Without a suitable title to my name, I wouldn't be able to enter regardless.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: 'Preparing for battle'... Conflict can be more unpredictable than the weather.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Considering you have someone to see, don't you feel some urgency?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Unless you're not worried they might die before you can meet.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Loubaan, how can I repay you for coming to my aid?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: How could I possibly ask something from a girl who spends her nights up in the rafters cradling her sword?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I do have a sword, after all.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Coming by to chat whenever you're free is enough for me.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: You have a safe place to hide here.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: And didn't you say that you were born in a river fort? Here in Lungmen, you can think of this flyover as the bridge across that river, and the street below is a little fort of your own.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: That old television can still play classic films on CD.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Just don't get too into them. Don't want you trying to play hero in real life.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Everything in this house is ancient artifacts from twenty or thirty years ago. If you start practicing your kung fu willy-nilly, you'll break it all.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: '...After traversing li upon li, so far from the jianghu, I fear that I shall never see her again.'
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: 'Perhaps it is for the best that you disappear. Jianghu herself will follow you, an eternal source of foes, and I do not wish to see you to take up arms against all under Heaven...'
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: Qiubai shows no interest in the story playing out on the TV screen, simply holding down the fast-forward button.
A movie poster inadvertently caught her eye earlier that day, which led her to peruse the stock of the DVD shop.
But as she rummages through the dust-covered disks, she is unable to find the so-called Grandmaster among the other movies.
This 'hero' has nary a drop of blood on his hands, just like the one in that drama series.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: This really would have me believe that every time blood is drawn, all the kung fu masters dodge the splatter using qinggong.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.text: 'Do it right, girl. This move here's a feint. You can take it easily.'
'This here is a shaving strike. Don't look away as you bring the blade down.'
'Oh, don't tell your parents we taught you these moves.'
'It's not that you're too young to be learning how to take up arms. It's just that... they probably still hope that you might look away.'

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: As if things could ever be that clean.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Qiu.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Are you asleep back there?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: No, I'm awake.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Ah, good.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Can you help me watch the store?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: You'd trust me with that?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Hasn't it already been more than two weeks since your last dust-up?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: You'll be fine. Not many customers this late at night, and our sign doesn't exactly bring in the crowds.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I might not know what sort of people are chasing you, but in the twenty-odd years I've lived here, we haven't had many ruffians coming around.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: And if they do show?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Then you bring down the shutters and close the doors. No need to wait for me to come back. Just find a moment to put the key under the mat.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Also, there'll probably be some drunks looking for trouble in the middle of the night.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: If any of them come into the store and won't leave, just give them what they want to make them happy.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: These things happen, can't really avoid it. If they happen to you, don't take it to heart.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If I really do run into one of those miscreants, I'll teach them a lesson.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Ah, no need to make a mountain out of a talpihill.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I won't, I'll just give them a scare.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You've shown me kindness, and I will do my best to repay it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Mafaan nei la.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Those flowers you're holding are beautiful.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Haha, are they? I love white flowers too. It's a shame that they're not for a happy occasion.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Are you going to visit a grave?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I suppose I am.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Life and death lie in the hands of Heaven, and it's not up to me to say if that's good or bad.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: No, nothing. I won't hold you up any longer.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Rental prices are on the wall, take a look.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Not even a 'funying gwonglam' from you, shopkeep?
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If you're just another drunk here to cause trouble, know that I've already kicked out a—
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I see you recognize this knife.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: I saw one just like it a month ago, stuck into the wall beside my antler.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I hear you had real quick reflexes that time, charged right through a window into the building by the road.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: You should have kept yourself hidden like before.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That wasn't my knife last time.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Before you draw your sword, you might want to guess as to how many eyes are on you.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Your knife has an insignia on its handle. You've come from a certain caravan.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: To be precise, the Yellow Sands do any job for coin. Armed escort is just one of our services.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: I took a bag of rations from you and now you've come all this way to kill me over it?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You were a wanderer in the wilds on the brink of starvation, we would've turned a blind eye, if you had eaten it yourself.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: But you went and roughed up my friends in the process, and used those rations to save an outcast.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: It is a habit of mine to share my meals. I've been saved by the kindness of others many times in the past, and I won't pass on the chance to save a life myself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That guy we threw out was no saint.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: After you saved him, he became obsessed with revenge, and hounded us out of our work.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Killing just him wouldn't be enough to make things right, now would it?
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Augh!
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: M-M hou yisi, I didn't mean to disturb you, I'll come back later...
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: No, it was my mistake for drawing my sword. I've caused a misunderstanding, I see.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: We've closed up shop, but we didn't sell all of the salt and pepper scalecis we made for the day. The boss told me to give you some.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: It's fresh from the wok and still hot. No good when it gets cold.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: I see you don't have any free hands, so I'll just leave it on the counter, okay?
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: Doje.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I hope you two enjoy it!
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: Well, this is a surprise.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: You found yourself a quiet place to settle down.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: No, it's mere happenstance.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: These things, it's like they're encased in glass. If I were to brandish my sword, it would be all too easy to shatter them in carelessness.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Like right now?
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Ah. I just got an idea.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Since what you really owe us is money, there's no need for you to pay with your life.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Is money all you think about?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Don't get me wrong. Our founding mission is to maintain order, uphold virtue, smite evil, that sort of thing. We're just looking to be properly compensated for our good deeds.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Since you love being a meddlesome busybody, you might as well meddle some more.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Have a look at this ledger.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: Plenty of bounties for infamous robbers and serial killers in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: You help us out with a job, use the bounty to repay us, the city's less one bad guy, and you get to keep the peace.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: On the other hand, if you decide not to play nice with us... I'm afraid it would be rather hard for you to protect that peace, on this street at least.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: So you're saying that if they're in this ledger, they're either a robber or a killer?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: You know, my mother says the grave that Lee tends... Its stone is totally blank!
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: She also doesn't go every year. It seems like out of the two decades or so her shop has been open, there's been a few years where she skipped the visit.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: She must have some secret buried deep in her heart, so secret that she can't even have the person's name carved on the stone.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: I don't know who it could be... or maybe it could be those people?
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: I wasn't planning on staying here for so long. I should be in Yumen.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'm sure someone in one of your supply transport teams can help me find a way there.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If you can agree to this condition, I might be able to help you with your other issues.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Not having to deal with another pain in my ass here... Hmph, I'm glad you're so reasonable, Siuje.
attributes.name: Customer

attributes.content: I hope that's it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Aiya, why are you here so early today? I only just opened up shop.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Every time you say you're not that interested in those CDs, but you've really gotten into them, haven't you?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I wouldn't say that many of them really interested me.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Well, there's lots of duds in there, so that's only natural. Any of them stand out to you?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I only remember thinking that most of the kung fu in them was all style, no substance.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Keh, you really didn't take an interest at all then, did you?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: These ones over here were outstanding, though.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Haha, I've gotten too old. My bones might ache all the time, but my eyes aren't so dim that I can't tell a skilled hand.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I suspect that anyone else would not have dared to try and free me from L.G.D. arrest.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, I've got plenty of experience dealing with them.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Although it might be thanks to the many mistakes of my youth, if my silver tongued could help a girl in need, then I'd say it was all worth it.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Who taught you how to swing a sword?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: My father's... friends taught me the basics. The rest I taught myself over the course of my travels.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I wouldn't know how to use one to stick a fin in a barrel.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Although I'd say you'd be better off not knowing. Best you keep that sword from spilling any blood. Just... don't end up like me.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Would you mind helping me hold the ladder? I need to swap those disks at the top for some newer ones.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Yesterday, it took to the afternoon to actually have any customers. My regulars usually only come once every twenty-four hours or so.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Qiubai looks down at a photograph she has on her of a young Liberi woman, her hair still not yet white with age.
It is a bounty for a bandit willing to kill for money, and that while her accomplices have mostly been executed, she alone remains at large many years later.
The shopkeep doesn't look back at her, focused on managing her store.
Out on the street, the shutters of the various stores and stalls all rise together with a thunderous crash, the neighbors greeting one another in familiar tones.
Hot cups of tea steam beside cash registers, while televisions blare out family sitcoms that have been running for over a hundred episodes.
The movies might not contain her enemies, but it was hard for them not to share one or two moments from her five years and thousands of li worth of travels.
Whose grave did you go to tend the other day?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If you're so curious, you should come with me next time.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Qiubai slowly loosens her hand that has been tightly gripping the hilt of her sword.
When I was young, my father taught me to repay hate with hate, while my mother taught me to repay kindness with kindness.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Where'd that come from, all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I'm setting out on my journey. I just wanted to express my gratitude.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: She stuffs the photo with the bounty into a crack in the cash register drawer, then quickly steps out of the store.
Until we meet again.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh hey, hasn't it been a few days since I last saw you? Want to come in to eat or...?
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: The rental shop's closed...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: When did that happen?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, it just closed this evening.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: I waved hello to Lee earlier today. She told me she had something to do, so she closed up earlier than usual.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: That's good to know.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: She must be gone by now.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, yes, I saw her walk off.
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: So uh, would you like to have a seat?
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm just passing through.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I doubt you'll be seeing her again. Too dangerous.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Dangerous? What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Dai Pai Dong Waiter

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. I'll take a look.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The key's still here...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It shouldn't be... What's happened to her?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Lee Loubaan!
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I figured you might show.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: You were thinking of leaving the shop to me, weren't you?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You decided that with all your past misdeeds and grudges dying with you, I could keep living here peacefully.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If you don't like that idea, then be sure to give the key to someone who does.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: When will your enemies arrive?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You may have laid aside your arms at your age, but I still have mine in hand.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Put that sword of yours away and sit with me awhile.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I thank you for your kindness, both in letting me know about the bounty, and for trying to cover my escape.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: There are many who hate me, and it's taken them this long to catch me. Should be enough for me to have a right laugh at them, no?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: You took the initiative and sought them out.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Otherwise, they would have had no way to hunt you down in this great city.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It was my arrival that drew attention to this street, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: An item two or three decades old will break at the slightest touch.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I'd say it wasn't you who broke the peace. If I hadn't helped you, I would have helped some other unfortunate swordsman or wandering child.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Either way, bloodstained as my hands are, isn't my death a good thing?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: So you were trying to get me to kill you that day, or at least expose you...?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If I hadn't asked around, I'm afraid I would have believed the rumors about your evil past, and I would not have returned to see you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Although the gang you were part of did many heinous deeds, you were not their ringleader, and you did not deserve to be hunted for so many years.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And besides, the gang was almost completely wiped out, with only you making it out alive... Were you perhaps a traitor, or maybe an undercover agent all along?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You've finally started to ask questions, I see.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Nobody else can give me the truth.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You're the only one I can ask.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I want to know... Do you really not care if your righteous deeds go unknown, if you can't explain your actions to the judge of the dead in the underworld?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What's to care about?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I wasn't an undercover agent for the imperial court, and I didn't steal from the rich to give to the poor.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Our group wandered the jianghu, and the best you could say is that we were a little bit nicer than other bandits. We bathed in blood. We were not righteous rebels, just hateful bastards.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: And that's why I wanted to stop you.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Once you go into jianghu, you can never leave.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Has Lungmen ever encountered a snowstorm before, Loubaan?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Nothing so dramatic. It just snows from time to time. Why?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: I... don't understand.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: When I was young, my father taught me to repay hate with hate, while my mother taught me to repay kindness with kindness. This I know well.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But my father also taught me of the river's expanse, and how it could take me to many places.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I've wandered for so long, but only now when I look back do I realize this land is far greater than any river, and there are many places that do not know the touch of flowing water.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Like Lungmen, for example, this nomadic city that can evade Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The year that I was born, Jiangqi had just finished its spring sowing when a Catastrophe plunged it back into deepest winter. It snowed for the entirety of May.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I don't understand what exactly traps us, while the land is so vast. People say that they cannot leave the jianghu, but where do the raging rapids of the jiang start? Where is the far edge of the hu's still waters?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Haha, some very good questions.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: If I don't make it to Yumen, I fear I will never understand.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I must meet that man...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I've just thought of something. Let's go for a walk. Together.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: That's enough thinking out of you.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: My enemies have been and gone. I drank my poisoned drink.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: My time is near.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You never did tell me whose grave this is, Loubaan.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If you still have regrets, I... can at least help you finish the marker.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Haha, no need...
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: The grave... is mine.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: You've been ready for a long time.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Whether or not you have someone to send you off, sooner or later, it comes knocking at your door.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Regrets are for the living. The dead? Not so much.
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: The old woman's flagging gaze is fixed on Qiubai for a long while, before slowly turning towards the gravestone.
Say... This river of yours... Where does it flow to...?
attributes.name: Rental Store Owner

attributes.content: Loubaan...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The old woman is no longer breathing.
Qiubai rests her body up against the gravestone, closing her eyes for her.
She looked at the marker in her final moments, the one without a name...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Maybe you really do care about what happens after you die?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You were a bandit, or maybe you were a hero.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Or maybe you were just a woman who managed to settle all her jianghu feuds. Lee, the rental shop loubaan.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You died over twenty years ago, on the day you settled down in Lungmen, or maybe you died today.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Maybe you didn't care... or maybe you've been trapped by this question your entire life.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: This uncarved gravestone stands out in a public cemetery in Lungmen, as if it is waiting for an answer.
Qiubai draws her sword.

attributes.text: There's a lot of scrapped swords in the weapon shop. Go and sneak one out, nobody will notice. Then, I'll teach you how to use it.
\nAlright, look, here's how you chop, here's how you stab... Hey, hey, be careful with that!
\nHey, are you alright? Scared the life outta me. If anything happened to you, he'd take my head...
\nAnyway, this sword's way too heavy for a little kid like you, so put it down. You can't let your sword fly out of your hands like that again!
Look at all the flowers I knocked loose! They're so pretty!
\nSnow's not the only thing that's white.

attributes.content: Her sword slashes forth.
The only thing on its point is a single white flower.
Grudges are difficult to break, which is why men are unable to escape, unable to walk away.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But that is not a reason for me to lay down my sword.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Neither is it a reason for me to continue wielding it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I've been to Yumen, Loubaan.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I think I've found my answer now.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Doje.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The white flower falls from her blade onto the plinth before the gravestone. Qiubai turns to leave.
The stone stands, still uncarved.
